name: Home Sweet Home (itch) (Stratos Kanavitsas)
description: Home Sweet Home is a psychological thriller based arround a man who wakes up in his family home. Created for Global Game Jam 2019 in 48 hours. The team had 6 members, Nikos Apostolakis, Stratos Kanavitsas, Dimitris Pachis, Alexandros Anemogiannis, Olympia Exarchakou and Nikolaos Ispanopoulos.
